entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
